metadata.synopsis: Steeps Evacuation: a family tries to get smuggled past the absolute ships and out of the city. They don't have enough cash so dad decides to stay and let mum and the kids leave first. This is a daughter, Blossom.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -218;9;-158- Talk to the female child 1.

0.speaker: Blossom
0.text: I don't like you! I don't like any of this! *Wuh-wuh-WHAAA!*

1.speaker: Blossom
1.text: I don't want to go without papa! Mama, he has to go with us!

2.speaker: Blossom
2.text: You look nice. And strong. Will you take care of my papa when he stays behind?
